name: Heaven and Hell On Earth
description: A unique girl and her adopted kid sister don’t remember much about their life before being in the orphanage. The choices they make could drastically affect not only their world but the new world they were thrust into. Things such as demons, angels, elves, and more exist. A prophecy speaks of a child lost who has the blood of all three tribes: The angels in the sky, the demons down below, and the elves hidden on earth.
